messages.audioSettingNotSupportedV3: Note: Currently, most audio settings are not applicable to v3
messages.changeWillTakeEffectOnNextRestart: Changes will take effect on next restart.
messages.userColorUpdated: You've successfully updated your user color!

tooltips.lbl_languageSelect: Set the default language for PianoRhythm.

elements.lbl_resetSettingsModalBodyText:
Are you sure you want to do this?

This will reset all your settings to the default and cannot be undone.

elements.txt_passwordChangeSubText: Enter your current password and the new password
elements.txt_deleteAccountSubText: Are you really sure? All of your account data will be permanently deleted
elements.txt_onIncorrectDeleteInputField: Please make sure you typed correctly in the input field.
elements.txt_confirmPasswordSubText: Please enter and confirm your password
elements.txt_emailChangeSubText: Enter the new email address and your password

tooltips.tgl_enable2fa: Add an extra layer of security with two-factor authentication (2FA).

messages.on2faDisable: After disabling two-factor authentication, logging in to your account will require password-only protection. Do you wish to continue with disabling two-factor authentication?

tooltips.hdr_notifications: Toggle what server notifications you receive.
tooltips.tgl_showMyCursor: Toggle whether your cursor is displayed to others.
tooltips.tgl_sendWhoistyping: Toggle whether other users know when you're typing.
tooltips.tgl_disableWhispers: Disable whispering. You can't whisper to others and vice versa.
tooltips.tgl_friendsOnlineStatus: Get notified when a friend comes online
tooltips.tgl_friendsOfflineStatus: Get notified when a friend goes offline
tooltips.tgl_emitMyStatusToFriends: Allow friends to know of your status changes. (Online, Offline, etc)
tooltips.tgl_sheetMusicChanges: Get notification emails whenever a change happens to your uploaded sheet music.

tooltips.swtch_syncDiscordMessages: Toggle whether Discord messages are synced in main lobby.

tooltips.lbl_pianoKeylayout: Set the keyboard piano layout for the piano.
tooltips.lbl_keyboardMaplayout: Set the correct keyboard input mapping.
tooltips.tgl_keyboard_toggleyz: For certain keyboard layouts, switching the mapping of the Y and Z keyboards aligns more naturally.

tooltips.lbl_engine: Toggle between 2D, 3D, or no graphics engine.
tooltips.lbl_maxFPS: Select the max frame rate of the rendering engine.

tooltips.hdr_displays: Toggle the displays of certain UI elements
tooltips.tgl_whoistyping: Toggle displaying when other users' are typing
tooltips.hdr_chat: Related UI settings for chat messages
tooltips.sld_chatMsgsHeightOffset: Set the height offset of the chatmessages container
tooltips.tgl_display3DStats: Toggle displaying extra stats/info about the 3d scene
tooltips.tgle_keepChatInFocus: Toggle whether to keep the chat in focus after submitting a message
tooltips.sld_chatMsg2DOpacity: Set the default opacity of the chat messages when it's unfocused. (2D mode)
tooltips.sld_chatMsg3DOpacity: Set the default opacity of the chat messages when it's unfocused. (3D mode)

tooltips.hdr_displays: Toggle the displays of certain blob related elements.

messages.soundfontLoading: Please wait while the soundfont loads!

tooltips.lbl_audioEngine:
Select the default audio engine.
(Takes effect on next restart)
tooltips.tgl_enableDrums: When enabled, this will allow percussion sounds to be played on channel 9 (zero-index base)
tooltips.hdr_v3Audio: Settings specific to the V3 Audio Engine
tooltips.lbl_initalBuffersize: Explanation coming soon. (Takes effect on next restart)
tooltips.tgl_showDebuglogs: When enabled, this will output performance logs to the console
tooltips.tgl_useAudioWorklet:
When enabled, this will load V3's audio engine into a separate thread in a an audio worklet process.
Should improve performance. (Takes effect on app restart)

tooltips.lbl_enableAudioToOutput: If checked and any output devices are active, then audio will only be emitted to the output device and not within PianoRhythm's audio engine
tooltips.tgl_mousePosVelocity:
This will enable having the mouse position determine the velocity of your computer keyboard input.

The closer your mouse is to the bottom of the browser window, the louder your notes will be
tooltips.sld_sustainCutoff: Set the release cutoff point for sustained notes. (Higher percentage = shorter sustain)
tooltips.tgl_enableVelocity: If unchecked, the raw velocity values from the source will not be used. Instead it'll be set to the max value (127)
tooltips.sld_velocityMuting: Mute notes with a velocity that is less than or equal to the meter value.
tooltips.sld_velocityBoost: Adds additional value to raw velocity
tooltips.lbl_metronome: Select the audio sample type to use for the metronome

tooltips.lbl_languageSelect: Set the default language for PianoRhythm.

messages.checkout_Created: A new tab has been opened. Continue checkout there!
messages.checkout_ResumePlan: You're about to resume your cancelled subscription. </br></br>Are you sure?
messages.checkout_Confirm: You're about to check out and subscribe to a premium plan. </br></br>Are you sure?
messages.subscription_cancellationFail: Sorry, something went wrong. Failed to cancel subscription.
messages.subscription_Updated: You've successfully updated your subscription plan!
messages.subText: Here's your current subscription. You can cancel or update it any time.
messages.cancellation_InProcess: Your current subscription has been canceled and therefore, will not be auto renewed. However, you will still have your benefits until {{billingDate}}.
messages.autoRenewInfo: Your subscription will automatically renew on {{billingDate}} and you'll be charged {{currencyText}}.
messages.cancellation_Confirm:
We're sorry to see you go, {{username}}!.
Your pro plan subscription is paid until {{planBillingDate}}.

If you would like to proceed with canceling your subscription, please select "Cancel Subscription" below.
